Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message
      • Agent

  • public class Agent
extends Message
    An Agent is a specialisation of a message. An Agent spreads information among Nodes. An is instantiated with a certain probability at nodes after detected events. An Agent maintains a routing map with 'his' event and all further events he learns about.
